I want you to think about that work that God's doing through the trial and developing us spiritually. No doubt that we could stand here this morning and we could give testimonies. And I can guarantee you that there will be some trials that are referenced as to how God developed us. Job said it this way in Job 23. Verse number 10, but he knoweth the way that I take. When he hath tried me, I shall come forth as gold. As gold. I want you to think about Job just for a moment. You say, man, I had a bad day. Read Job. Seriously. How many of you have read Job before? Okay. If you've read Job, I'm guessing that you've never had a day like Job had. And Job says, he knoweth the way that I take.
